titles.title: Transit Tax Parity Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the rule providing parity for the exclusion from income for employer-provided mass transit and parking benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/24/2015--Introduced. Transit Tax Parity Act of 2015
This bill makes the tax exclusion for employer-provided mass transit benefits equal to the amount of the exclusion for parking benefits (i.e., $175) and makes such exclusion permanent.
